title: Post Release Changes
description: The number of changes made to an artifact after it was released.
interpretations: The number of changes made to the feature's requirement after it was released.
The number of changes made to the architecture design module after it was released.
A low number indicates the extent to which a solution are carefully designed and clearly formulated for later implementation and testing.
A low number indicates the extent to which task requirements are carefully planned and clearly formulated for later implementation and testing.
